type.description: Button type, Can be set to default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: 按钮类型，可设置为默认主信息成功警告危险

native-type.description: Native button type, Can be set to button submit reset
native-type.description_zh: 原生按钮类型，可设置为按钮提交重置

size.description: Button size, Can be set to normal mini small large
size.description_zh: 按钮尺寸，可设置为普通迷你小号大号

loading-radius.description: Loading radius, Can only be used when loading-type="circle"
loading-radius.description_zh: 加载半径，只能在loading-type=“circle”时使用

loading-type.description: Loading type, Can be set to circle wave cube rect disappear
loading-type.description_zh: 加载类型，可设置为圆波立方体消失

loading-size.description: Loading size, Can be set to large normal small mini
loading-size.description_zh: 装载尺寸，可设置为大号普通小号迷你

auto-loading.description: Autoload mode for easy handling of asynchronous tasks
auto-loading.description_zh: 自动加载模式，可轻松处理异步任务

icon-container.description: Whether to serve as an icon container

elevation.description: Elevation level, options true false and level of 0-24
elevation.description_zh: 高程级别，选项 true false 和 0-24 级别

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when the button is clicked. Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: 单击按钮时触发。加载或禁用状态为 true 时未触发

events.name: touchstart
events.description: Triggered when the button is touchstart, Not triggered when loading or disabled status is true
events.description_zh: 当按钮为触摸启动时触发，当加载或禁用状态为 true 时未触发
